statements.name: PROC TEXTCONCEPTSCORE
statements.description: The TEXTCONCEPTSCORE statement performs concept and fact extraction by using a compiled LITI model.

statements.name: ID
statements.description: The ID statement names the variable in the DATA= table that contains the document IDs. This statement is required.

statements.name: INPUT
statements.description: The INPUT statement names the variable in the DATA= table that contains the text of the documents to be analyzed. This statement is required.

statements.name: OUTPUT
statements.description: The OUTPUT statement specifies the output table to contain the concept match results. This statement is optional.
